Klasse InfoBoxManager

java.lang.Object
viewmodel.InfoBoxManager
public class InfoBoxManager extends Object
Manages the display of informational messages and damage card updates.

This class is responsible for updating the info message, displaying damage card notifications, and loading card images as needed.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • InfoBoxManager

      public InfoBoxManager(javafx.scene.text.Text infoText, javafx.scene.image.ImageView infoImage, javafx.scene.text.Text damageText, Client client, GameDataBridge gameDataBridge)
      Constructs an InfoBoxManager with the specified UI elements and client data.
      Parameter:
      infoText - the text node used for displaying info messages.
      infoImage - the image view used for displaying card images.
      damageText - the text node used for displaying damage card information.
      client - the client instance.
      gameDataBridge - the game data bridge providing game-related data.

  • Methodendetails

    • updateInfoMessage

      public void updateInfoMessage(String playerName, int currentPhase)
      Updates the info message based on the current phase of the game.

      The message is updated with the player name and a phase-specific message. In phase 3, the last played card image is loaded and displayed.

      Parameter:
      playerName - the name of the current player.
      currentPhase - the current phase of the game.

    • loadCardImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image loadCardImage(String cardName)
      Loads the image corresponding to the specified card name.
      Parameter:
      cardName - the name of the card.
      Gibt zurück:
      the Image object if loaded successfully; otherwise, null.
